name: Stionic Core – Create Mobile app for WordPress news
author: Noncheat

sections.description:
Stionic Core has expanded the WordPress REST API for the purpose of matching the functionality contained in a WordPress mobile application.
Allows you create mobile app for WordPress news website.

Demo

We have built the demo mobile app with this plugin, you can see here
And you don’t need programming skills, because we did everything.
Most notably, in addition to working perfectly with WordPress website. We have optimized it!
As a result you will have a mobile application WordPress website very fast with extremely interesting functions.

You can install this plugin and ask us to create a free demo application for your website.
Any questions please mail us contact@noncheat.com

Features

  • This plugin support config informations for WordPress mobile application.
  • Sort categories, config featured image size.
  • Insert Native ads on posts content.
  • Show Deeplinks button when viewing on mobile, OneSignal push notifcation.
  • Extending endpoints of posts, categories, comments, pages.
  • Include featured image url, featured image square url, categories of post, next & previous posts.

Docs & Support

You can find docs.
If you were unable to find the answer to your question on the documentation, you should check the support forum on WordPress.org.
If you can’t locate any topics that pertain to your particular issue, post a new topic for it.

Recommended Plugins

The following plugins are recommended for Stionic Core users:

  • Category Image by Muhammad Said El Zahlan. You can set categories image.
  • Insert Post Ads by InsertPostAds. You can set ads native.
  • Contact Form 7 by Takayuki Miyoshi. You can set contact form.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire stionic-core folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

You will find ‘Stionic’ menu in your WordPress admin panel.

For basic usage, you can also have a look at the plugin web site.
sections.faq:
Do you have questions or issues with Stionic Core? Use these support channels appropriately.

  1. Stionic
  2. Support forum

  • Fix deeplinks tool esc_url

  • Update deeplink button UI
  • OneSignal setting Default params and Default send

  • Support filter posts has Rewards ads

1.0.18

  • Ignore sticky posts in list posts, Increase badge iOS OneSignal

1.0.17

  • Update allow header origin function

1.0.16

  • Include m_comment_count in posts data

1.0.15

  • Support m_posts API get private posts
  • m_tools deeplinks got final url for universal link
  • Fix m_categories conflict settings Stionic Categories

  • Support setting posts meta required Rewards ads

1.0.13

  • Support deeplinks tool encodeURI

1.0.12

  • Update WordPress 5.3

  • Fix customize Header Allow Orgin wildcard * conflict Header Credentials

  • Add customize notification message in OneSignal setting

  • Fix deeplinks problem

1.0.8

  • Fix some small bugs
  • Add filter send notification

1.0.7

  • Fix some small bugs
  • Fix send notification title
  • Add hide/show categories checkbox
  • Add show all categories config
  • Add tags parameter to m_posts

1.0.6

  • Fix some small bugs
  • Add hidden categories in application
  • Add $request param to filter args endpoint
  • Add excerpt to posts endpoint
  • Support notification on schedule posts

1.0.5

  • Fix some small bug
  • Add filter args endpoints

1.0.4

  • Add Endpoints hook
  • Add params exclude_categories, type in m_posts endpoint

1.0.3

  • Add translate
  • Edit menu
  • Fix insert posts ads settings
  • Add customize field config
  • Add avatar data on comments endpoints

1.0.2

  • Add parent data to categories endpoints
  • Allow set default show or disable featured images in application detail page
  • Allow change Button Deeplinks text
  • When have params stionicDeeplinks in url then auto click Deeplinks button
  • Fix deeplinks auto click functions

1.0.1

  • Default show featured in top Detail pages
  • Add include params on Categories endpoints

1.0.0

For more information, see Releases.
